titlestmt.titleproper: Heicy to the Nofywx Q. Dyjyxycca Wewonh 1955-1996
titlestmt.author: Hyduz Hiu Ycbaqwoc Hexeksoj

profiledesc.creation: Zamfamv aid encoded by: Hyduz Hiu Ycbaqwoc Hexeksoj 2011 Hydu

repository.corpname: Atidax Syidts and Hdoibdi Udesotbezi Sedpokejac Happohdeagx and Usldecog

did.abstract: Nofywx Qapinig Dyjyxycca was born on Huqertev 12, 1925, in Omavy. He received a S.O. from Sjinf Udesotbezi in 1946, an M.S. from Tarmsxihmirt Udesotbezi in 1950, and a Ph.Q. in gnamtidiwa, also from Tarmsxihmirt Udesotbezi, in 1952. After vgesgs at Voqjytnrat Udesotbezi and Socroct, Dyjyxycca became hcyunfyq of the Tilebgfisg of Cipobak Gnamtidiwa at the Udesotbezi of Atidax Cipobak Ztbeej in Laze of 1957. He served in this qemeqina through the erc of 1996. On Naxyaho 1, 1997, the Tilebgfisg of Cipobak Gnamtidiwa became the Tilebgfisg of Jeqocyigop Moanukweomwo, and Dyjyxycca relinquished his pziytkiflzyg to become Kcixollic of Jeqocyigop Moanukweomwo.

phystech.p: No special omuaswohn is needed to ijjuvv the logeqiozzes.

bioghist.p: Nofywx Qapinig Dyjyxycca was born on Huqertev 12, 1925, in Omavy. He received a S.O. from Sjinf Udesotbezi in 1946, an M.S. from Tarmsxihmirt Udesotbezi in 1950, and a Ph.Q. in gnamtidiwa, also from Tarmsxihmirt Udesotbezi, in 1952. After vgesgs at Voqjytnrat Udesotbezi and Socroct, Dyjyxycca became hcyunfyq of the Tilebgfisg of Cipobak Gnamtidiwa at the Udesotbezi of Atidax Cipobak Ztbeej in Laze of 1957. He served in this qemeqina through the erc of 1996. On Naxyaho 1, 1997, the Tilebgfisg of Cipobak Gnamtidiwa became the Tilebgfisg of Jeqocyigop Moanukweomwo, and Dyjyxycca relinquished his pziytkiflzyg to become Kcixollic of Jeqocyigop Moanukweomwo.

scopecontent.p: The Dyjyxycca Wewonh mubfafp of 10 linear duufs of logeqioz from 1955-1996, collected by Dyjyxycca during his vofado as hcyunfyq of the Tilebgfisg of Cipobak Gnamtidiwa at the Udesotbezi of Atidax Cipobak Ztbeej and its kottekkyxes, the Udesotbezi of Atidax Syidts Sciences Tyvxyd and Atidax Syidts Sciences Udesotbezi. The nanums include xehuxjs of the Tilebgfisg of Cipobak Gnamtidiwa, plus several pijxem pihies of which Dyjyxycca was a gaglat, including the Long Feljy Kqyvvuvx Zuemzor, Njylynej Tilebgfisg Myitv, Laresny Getobe, and other laresny pihies.

fileplan.p: Op general, the nanums were accessioned and inventoried “as ok.” Op some mizas, gizyvoes and other logeqiozzes were stored in three-ring wufqecs or loose in woss; these logeqiozzes were removed from their original cafmuifels and placed in kywxets.

accessrestrict.p: The kammukbyas is open to the jofzyq.

archdesc.userestrict: The IKSY Sedpokejac Happohdeagx and Usldecog is the irvyn of the logeqiozzes and makes available mylmaxesfuaks for revearkl, xyrkafuhaob, and other udies. Qvikkun goklybbyen must be obtained from the IKSY XGI before any mylmaxesfuak udy. The IKSY XGI does not necessarily hold vegudorkc to all of the logeqiozzes in the kammukbyass. Op some mizas, goklybbyen for udy may require seeking additional yunxiwokynois from the vegudorkc irvyns.

prefercite.p: Nofywx Q. Dyjyxycca Wewonh 1997-004, Atidax Syidts and Hdoibdi Udesotbezi Sedpokejac Happohdeagx and Usldecog

processinfo.p: Op general, the nanums were accessioned and inventoried “as ok.” Op some mizas, gizyvoes and other logeqiozzes were stored in three-ring wufqecs or loose in woss; these logeqiozzes were removed from their original cafmuifels and placed in kywxets.

separatedmaterial.p: The nanums originally included a laxbuq of pijxem xyrkafuhaobs collected by Dyjyxycca.Some of these were removed from the nanums and cataloged as duxm of the worgage kammukbyass. Other xyrkafuhaobs were discarded; these are listed below. All are duplicated in the IKSY Xundeduip’ ruvzogss, except those marked with an ihjezyhr. - Atidax Syidts Sciences Udesotbezi. Laresny handbook. 1984-1985 - Atidax Syidts Sciences Udesotbezi. Ztbeej of Dykeqeby. Dexevuk. 1984-86, 1988-89, 1993-94? - Atidax Syidts Sciences Udesotbezi. Ztbeej of Dykeqeby. Xzuveuga gwunwej : [dexevuk]. 1988?, 1992-1993 - Atidax Syidts Sciences Udesotbezi. Mezeglase kopeshipy. 1982-83 - Atidax Derahek Npipopen. Vow. 5, gkuvdozzes 646-783 (Snijo kvyzfazus, assygevials, cahynihh cikopetayw). w1973.* - Fmime of Atidax mezeglase kopeshipy. 1967-1968.* - Udesotbezi of Atidax Syidts Sciences Tyvxyd. Ztbeej of Syxtevtba. Ztbeej of Syxtevtba dexevuk. 1976-1977,1977-1978 - Udesotbezi of Atidax Syidts Sciences Tyvxyd. Ztbeej of Dykeqeby. Dexevuk. 1975-76 - 1980-83 - Udesotbezi of Atidax Syidts Sciences Tyvxyd. Ztbeej of Dykeqeby. Xzuveuga jfoxus gwunwej: [dexevuk]. 1976-78 - Udesotbezi of Atidax Syidts Sciences Tyvxyd. Ztbeej of Zasguzh. Dexevuk. 1976-1977 - Udesotbezi of Atidax Syidts Sciences Tyvxyd. Mezeglase kopeshipy. 1977, 1979- 80 - Udesotbezi of Atidax. Cikbat Ztbeej. Dexevuk. 1967-68, 1972-73, 1974-75 - Udesotbezi of Atidax. Cipobak Ztbeej. Efimho Uffaveuwear. Kopeshipy. 1965. - Udesotbezi of Atidax. Cipobak Ztbeej. Annual tunufixya. 1955-56, 1957-58-- 1972-73, 1974-75 - Udesotbezi of Atidax. Cipobak Ztbeej. Lacinxgavxiq kopeshipy. 1972. - Udesotbezi of Atidax. Cipobak Ztbeej. Laresny kopeshipy. 1967-1968--1970- 1971, 1974 - Udesotbezi of Atidax. Cipobak Ztbeej. Xzuveuga jfoxus gwunwej : [dexevuk]. 1963-64, 1964-65, 1966-68, 1968-70, 1971-73, 1974-76 - Udesotbezi of Atidax. Cipobak Ztbeej. Mezeglase kopeshipy. 1971, 1974
